_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: KissMP Server
author: me@weilbyte.dev
description: Server for the KISS Multiplayer BeamNG.drive mod

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update 
apt install -y curl unzip jq

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/TheHellBox/KISS-multiplayer/releases/latest")
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/TheHellBox/KISS-multiplayer/releases")
MATCH=KissMP_

if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i ${MATCH})
else
    VERSION_CHECK=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
    if [ "${VERSION}" == "${VERSION_CHECK}" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i ${MATCH})
    else
        echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url)
    fi
fi

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

curl -sSL -o kissmp.zip ${DOWNLOAD_URL}
unzip kissmp.zip
rm -rf kissmp.zip

if [ -f /mnt/server/kissmp-server ]; then
    echo -e "Install complete"
    chmod +x /mnt/server/kissmp-server
    
    # Generate config
    ./kissmp-server & serverpid=$! 
    sleep 1
    kill $serverpid
    
    exit 0
else 
    echo -e "Install failed (no /mnt/server/kissmp-server file present)"
    exit 1
fi

## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
